forum.name: Value and limitations of OER in science instruction
forum.intro:
Now that we have discussed how OER might be integrated into instruction, we will look at one OER that was reviewed by adult educators and used in adult education science instruction.

Review the PhET Interactive Simulation on Forces and Motion.

Read the comments about this OER posted by other adult education science teachers.

Then on the discussion board, post your comments regarding the following statements on the discussion board:

  1. Which science and engineering practices might be supported through the use of this OER? (You may find it convenient to look at the Science & Engineering Practices Checklist.)
  2. WhatÂ content skills or understandings would learners develop as they use this OER?
  3. What challenges would you foresee if you were to use this OER in your own class?
